Reviews.Title: Good camera for the money
Reviews.Author: tttttttttttttttttttt
Reviews.Content: Good camera for the money it costs. this camera was installed in an office and works well. it has a good picture and the night  vision is good too. of course being an ir night vision camera the ir lights are visible but all in all a decent camera and i would order more for other jobs.

ProductInfo.Features:
Color CCD image sensor. NTSC Signal system
Horizontal Resolution: 420 TV Lines. 0.1 lux
Built in 4-9mm zoom Lens
Adjustment of full 360-degree horizontal and 90-degree vertical
Package included: 1 x zoom dome camera, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply and 1 x security warning sticker
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Color CCD CCTV Dome Security Camera 420TVL 4-9mm Varifocal Lens for Home DVR Surveillance System with Power Supply and Free Security Warning DeCal 1P2
